subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Led by four freshmen who combined for 60 points, the Blue Devils surged past the Badgers, a fellow No. 1 seed, for their fifth national title under Coach Mike Krzyzewski.
snippet: Led by four freshmen who combined for 60 points, the Blue Devils surged past the Badgers, a fellow No. 1 seed, for their fifth national title under Coach Mike Krzyzewski.
